play around.translation[0].definitions[0: to have a sexual relationship with someone who is not your usual partner
It was years before I realized he’d been playing around.
Wasn’t she playing around with another man?
play around.translation[0].definitions[1: to try doing something in different ways, to see what would be best, especially when this is fun
Play around with the ingredients if you like.
play around.translation[0].definitions[2: to behave in a silly way or waste time, when you should be doing something more serious
